Package main.com.cryptogram.solver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataReader
    This class is in charge of reading in data from different files
    DataStorage
    This class manages all of the words in the encrypted message
    Dictionary
    This class manages all of the english words read in from my file.
    Index
    This class holds the indexes for a current pair one encrypted word = one decrypted word
    Key
    This class is in charge of managing the key for the cryptogram
    Punctuation
    This class manages punctuation, which is separated into two categories.
    Solver
    This class is in charge of the algorithm for solving the cryptogram.
    StringPattern
    This class creates patterns for each word to be used to match pairs
